titleStmt.title: Eikōn brotoloigoy, or, The picture of Titus Oates, D.D. drawn to the life, in a letter to himself.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: First two words of title in Greek characters.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
